actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code in order to count, for purposes of nonregular retirement pay, service before World War II in certain State militia units which were racially segregated.

summary.text: Includes, for the purpose of computing military nonregular retirement pay, service in State militia units between 1930 and 1941 if such unit was restricted to individuals not of the Caucasian race and was ordered to active duty during World War II.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code in order to count, for purposes of nonregular retirement pay, service before World War II in certain State militia units which were racially segregated.
